paragraphs.text: Tailored Solutions and Integrations for Your IGA, EAM, PAM and Customer IAM Needs

Since founded in 2015, SharpITS has rapidly become a trusted leader in Identity and Access Management (IAM) solutions that secure access and identities for enterprises.With onshore and offshore delivery capabilities, we provide flexible 24/7 global professional services and support that meets your needs. Our Zero-Defect Quality Model ensures flawless IAM delivery.Our large pool of IAM experts and consultants hold certifications across all leading technologies, allowing customized solutions tailored to your environment.
IAM Modernization  Services
Managed Services
Professional Services
Staff Augmentation
Advisory and  Assessment

Okta Identity Cloud is a leading SaaS-delivered converged IAM platform broadly used across both workforce and CIAM use cases. Newly acquired Auth0 Platform is a SaaS product commercialized for CIAM and developer use cases.
Auth0 is known for its developer-focused products. Auth0 has a strong focus and specialization in customer identity and access management (CIAM), for both B2C and B2B scenarios.
Transform your business with  our  digital identity solutions

At SharpITS, we offer integrated identity and access management solutions to secure access and provide visibility across your hybrid infrastructure. Our comprehensive capabilities govern identities, manage access, prevent unauthorized access, and deliver insights into user access thus enabling Zero Trust.
Identity Governance  and Administration
Enterprise Access   Management
Privileged Access    Management
Customer Identity    and Access Mgmt

/services/iam-modernization-services.title: Advanced IAM Modernization Services | Top IAM Solution Providers

headings.text: Transform and modernize your legacy IAM systems, build your next generation IAM platform
Achieve faster time to market for your new digital business services while ensuring they are implemented securely and efficiently using SharpITS IAM Modernization Services.
Why SharpITS for Your IAM Modernization Services
Count on our expertise and experience for an exceptional IAM journey.

paragraphs.text: Legacy identity systems can't keep pace with today's dynamic IT environments and advanced threats. Siloed and stale platforms lead to security gaps, management headaches, poor user experiences, and ballooning costs.

At SharpITS, we provide expert  IAM Modernization Services to future-proof your identity and access management platform. We help organizations transform outdated systems and processes to achieve unified access control, intelligent security and simplified management.
Security risks and vulnerabilities due to outdated systems and lack of integration between siloed platforms
Lack of actionable insights into access and activities to make data-driven decisions.
Emerging technologies like cloud and mobile not supported properly on legacy IAM platforms.
Soaring costs becoming unsustainable as maintaining outdated systems requires excessive resources.
Non-compliance with regulations and lack of auditing capabilities on aging systems.
Poor user experience causing frustration and loss of productivity due to legacy systems.
Some of the key IAM Modernization  project success factors are
SharpITS can help you all from end to end and efficiently
Simplify your enterprise architecture
Enable modern feature sets and enhanced security controls,
Improve usability, performance and scalability
Address audit and compliance findings
Consolidate your siloed IAM systems
Migrate from in-house or legacy solutions to modernized and/or cloud-based IAM systems
Automate your access controls, reduce the complexity and costs, improve operational efficiency
Modernize your IAM systems,
Hi there! Myself IAMate. Your virtual advisor.

items: Migrate to cloud-based IAM platforms to accelerate capabilities and lower TCO.
Avoid prolonged complex on-prem IAM projects. Adopt configurable cloud solutions.
Prioritize enabling business capabilities over platform customization.
Start with high-value identity use cases like access requests and SSO.
Show success with targeted quick wins before expanding scope
Gradually phase out legacy systems as new capabilities go live.
Tie modernization projects to business KPIs like lower IT costs or improved user productivity
Maintain engagement by showing measurable wins for each milestone.
Communicate IAM success stories for adoption across the business.
Set a strategic vision but plan for adaptability.
Align to identity priorities like least-privilege access and governance.
Adjust pace and scope as needs evolve across multi-year modernization.

/services/iam-professional-services.title: IAM Professional Services | Identity Access Management Services

headings.text: Accelerate your IAM Implementation with Industry Experts

Address complex IAM challenges, achieve faster time to market for your new IAM implementation while ensuring they are implemented securely and efficiently using SharpITS IAM Professional Services led by knowledgeable identity experts with years of experience.
Why SharpITS for Your IAM Implementation
Comprehensive IAM Expertise And Delivery Excellence
Managing the user identity life cycle
How Can SharpITS Help your IAM Implementation

paragraphs.text: With over a decade of experience implementing identity and access management (IAM) solutions, SharpITS is an ideal partner for your IAM professional services needs. Our  certified IAM consultants have led many successful deployments across industries following  best practices to accelerate realization of value.At SharpITS, we take a holistic approach and look at complex IAM problems through multiple dimensions to understand our customer’s real needs, develop solutions, and create effective results.

Our practice leaders remain current on the latest technologies and are backed  by Centers of Excellence focused on leading IAM platforms. With SharpITS’s Professional Services, enterprises can leverage our resources and  IAM expertise to select, implement, configure, customize and operate IAM tools and services.From architecting cloud-based IAM to migrating legacy systems to modern platforms, SharpITS has the technical skills to design and customize complex, enterprise-grade IAM systems. We supplement deployments with tailored training and documentation to enable smooth adoption within your organization. And we  guarantee our expertise and experience will always support you in your entire IAM journey.

With a large pool of certified IAM professionals and a proven delivery track record for enterprise implementations, SharpITS has the expertise to architect, deploy, and manage complex IAM solutions tailored to your needs. Our consultants leverage decades of collective experience while our practice leaders contribute to shaping IAM best practices and standards worldwide. Our methodology, expertise and experience provide assurance that your most mission-critical IAM initiatives will be delivered successfully.
IAM systems can be complex and difficult to implement, manage, and maintain.
Integrating IAM with existing systems and processes can be a major challenge.
Ensuring the security and privacy of sensitive data is a major concern in IAM.
Getting users to adopt new IAM systems and change their behaviour can be challenging.
Meeting regulatory and industry compliance requirements can be difficult in IAM.
The rapid pace of technological change in IAM can make it difficult for organizations to keep up.
Managing the full user identity life cycle, including provisioning, de-provisioning, and changes to roles and permissions, can be complex.
Finding the right balance between security and user experience can be challenging in IAM.
A thorough analysis of an organization's existing IAM infrastructure, processes, and policies, to identify areas of improvement and potential solutions.
SharpITS develops a comprehensive implementation plan tailored to your environment and objectives for a phased, low-risk deployment.
Installing and configuring of the IAM solutions, including any required custom integration work, following security best practices.
We seamlessly integrate the IAM technologies with your organization's existing systems and processes to provide unified identity management.
Testing of IAM solutions with a representative group of users to ensure that they meet the organization's needs and are user-friendly.
Develop a change management plan to smoothly deploy IAM solutions into production and roll out capabilities to end-users in a structured manner.
Training for users and IT staff on the use and administration of IAM solutions, as well as ongoing support for the solutions.
Continual support, monitoring and maintenance to keep your IAM solutions optimized and aligned to evolving needs.
Build a Secure and Efficient
Hi there! Myself IAMate. Your virtual advisor.

/services/iam-managed-services.title: Discover the Reliable IAM Managed Service Providers | SharpITS

headings.text: Secure access, Simple management. Managed IAM services made easy.
We provide fully managed IAM services to govern access, reduce risk, and achieve compliance. Our experts customize and run your IAM program so you can focus on core business goals.
SharpITS manages your entire IAM operations - from users to systems - with leading technologies and proven practices. We make access secure, easy and efficient.
Delivery of continuous advancement and Progress
Why SharpITS for IAM Managed Services
How Can SharpITS Help  Manage your IAM Systems

paragraphs.text: Manual, inefficient processes coupled with lack of holistic visibility into access make it extremely difficult for organizations to achieve proper identity governance, implement least privilege access, and keep pace with ever-changing compliance requirements. Scaling IAM is challenging with complex, siloed systems and constantly changing needs. And lack of in-house IAM expertise stretches IT teams thin and makes risks higher.

Our methodology involves discovery, strategizing roadmap, implementing optimized processes/automation, fully managing day-to-day operations, continuous enhancement and reporting, with comprehensive support. This enables us to provide reliable, efficient IAM administration and maintenance. The outcome is optimized identity security and compliance without taxing your internal teams.
Our team of certified IAM professionals have the proven knowledge and hands-on experience to expertly manage and optimize your IAM environment.
Reduce expenses by leveraging our economies of scale versus staffing IAM expertise in-house. Our flexible model aligns costs to your needs.
We provide on-demand flexibility to scale your IAM capabilities up or down as your needs change. No more over or under provisioning.
Our 24x7 vigilance and focus on IAM security best practices reduce risk of threats exploiting vulnerabilities in your access systems.
Lower business risk by relying on our highly trained and seasoned team to manage IAM complexities versus overburdening internal staff.
Let us design and run optimized IAM processes leveraging automation and other proven efficiencies we’ve perfected across client engagements.

SharpITS provides well-architected reviews, configuration rule checks, risk prevention, management, and more. SharpITS monitors services 24x7x365 with proactive alarms and a complete incident management lifecycle—from response to resolution.
Our experienced team will handle the day-to-day administration, maintenance, monitoring and enhancement of your IAM environment following ITIL-aligned  processes and best practices.
Multi levels of support L1, L2 and L3, can be available 8x5 or 24x7 coverage.
Planning, scheduling and executing periodic access reviews across all systems to validate appropriateness
Managing the identity lifecycle including user access provisioning, role or entitlement assignments, and timely deprovisioning .
Manage authentication, authorization, SSO, and multi-factor authentication across cloud and on-prem apps.
Manage roles, entitlements and segregation of duties to optimize access.
Coordinating the application of security updates, patches, and upgrades in line with vendor releases to maintain resilience
Utilize our IAM experts to administer, monitor and enhance your IAM environment day-to-day.
Generating and distributing audit-ready reports for compliance requirements and internal governance needs
Focus on your business

headings.text: SharpITS virtual CISOs provide on-demand expertise and leadership to guide you in building robust cybersecurity capabilities tailored to your organization's needs - strengthening information protection and reducing risk.

paragraphs.text: With cyber threats rapidly evolving, many companies recognize the need for dedicated security leadership but lack the resources for a full-time CISO. Enter the Virtual CISO (vCISO) - providing expert security guidance on a flexible, as-needed basis.

A Virtual Chief Information Security Officer (vCISO) serves as an organization’s cybersecurity liaison and an expert on all facets of IT and the business. vCISOs are highly experienced security professionals who audit an organization’s policies, controls, and processes to mitigate risks. The vCISO model enables security guidance and modeling without requiring a full-time headcount.
Our vCISOs provide strategic leadership across core cybersecurity capabilities:
• Risk assessments identifying threats, vulnerabilities, business impacts and risk prioritization.
• Audit preparation and remediation roadmap
Incident Response
• Incident response planning and runbook development
• Incident response testing and simulations
Policies and Standards
• Information security policies and standards development
• Guidance on regulatory compliance requirements and frameworks such as PCI DSS, HIPAA, GDPR, and CCPA.
Security Operations
• Security monitoring, alerting, investigation and threat hunting
• Implementation of essential security tools like SIEM
• Cybersecurity metrics,KPIs and executive reporting.
• Vendor risk assessments and management
• Cyber insurance evaluation and guidance.
Awareness and Training
• Security awareness campaigns and training
• Social engineering testing and red team exercises

Our VCISO methodology creates a targeted security strategy tailored to your organization's specific risks and needs. Our approach delivers maximized and sustainable risk reduction while optimizing your existing security investments. SharpiTS architects a strategic defense to safeguard your most valuable assets - your people, data, and mission
Sign SOW, Kickoff meeting, Set communication cadence, Identify key stakeholders
Current state analysis, Control evaluation, Risk assessment, Gap analysis, Staff & process review
Set security roadmap, Prioritize initiatives, Budget/resource plan, Update policies & standards.
Rollout improved controls, Deploy new safeguards, Staff training, Awareness program, technology upgrades
Tune SOC/IR plan, Ongoing threat monitoring, Vulnerability management, Refine processes
Quarterly progress reviews, Continual enhancement planning, Ensure alignment to business

With SharpITS vCISO service, experience the benefits of a top-tier security program tailored to your unique business needs. By leveraging our seasoned advisors, you reduce risks, optimize existing staff, gain flexibility to scale security on your terms, and most importantly - sleep easier knowing your critical systems and data are protected 24/7.
Strategic guidance scaled to your business
Our vCISOs provide enterprise grade solutions that are tailored to your organization's specific risks and priorities
Optimizing your existing investments
Our vCISOs maximize the value of your current security resources through improved tools, training and processes
Avoiding high-cost disasters
Expert guidance identifies and mitigates risks before they become major breaches.
Staying current with compliance
We ensure your organization meets changing compliance regulations and frameworks.
Flexibility on your terms
Easily scale vCISO services up or down to match your changing needs.
Confidence in the face of uncertainty
With seasoned vCISOs guiding your defenses, you can strategically grow without undue cyber risk.
SharpITS Key Differentiators

Our vCISOs hold top industry certifications including CISSP, CISM, and CISA, and our services stand apart through our proven risk-based approach and flexible engagement model. We provide vendor-agnostic guidance focused solely on your best interests, not future sales opportunities.
Customized Security Programs
Our vCISOs take the time to understand your organization's specific risks, compliance needs and security priorities. We tailor our advice and security programs to your environment.
On-Demand Expertise
You get access to a team of certified CISOs with decades of combined experience. Engage our vCISOs as much or as little as you need.
Cost-Effective Security
Our vCISO provides enterprise-level security and support for a fraction of the cost of a full-time hire.
Objective Security Guidance
As an independent third-party, our vCISOs provide unbiased advice focused solely on strengthening your security posture.
Rapid Deployment
Our vCISOs can be onboarded in days to start assessing your security gaps and providing recommendations.
Updated Compliance Knowledge
Our vCISOs stay current on the latest compliance regulations and standards to ensure your security program meets all requirements.
Industry Benchmarking
We've worked with a number of clients across sectors and can benchmark your security program against industry best practices.

In today's climate of growing cyber threats, you need security advisors ready for the fight. Our vCISOs are battle-tested pillars of digital defense, now bringing their experience to build a cybersecurity program tailored to your unique requirements, budget, and risks. Don't wait for disaster - contact SharpITS today to enlist our virtual CISO services and get enterprise-grade security leadership scaled for any organization.
Hi there! Myself IAMate. Your virtual advisor.

headings.text: IAM technologies are complex and require specific skill set. Access top talented identity experts to speed up your IAM projects any time needed.
Why SharpITS For IAM Staff Augmentation?
Benefits Of SharpITS For IAM Staff Augmentation
When Will Staff Augmentation  Be The Right Choice?
Here are a few instances when staff augmentation can be beneficial for your business:

paragraphs.text: At SharpITS, we provide exclusive access to the industry's best identity and access management talent through our staff augmentation services. Our pre-vetted IAM professionals seamlessly integrate into your team to fill critical skills gaps and offload overburdened staff. Simply activate the expertise needed to elevate your IAM program - whether highly specialized capabilities or extra capacity for routine tasks.

Our IAM specialists have proven expertise across leading IAM technologies and platforms. For over a decade, we have been providing high quality IAM experts at discounted rates to consulting firms including the Big 4. Our pay-as-you-go model flexes to your changing priorities, budgets, and roadmaps. And our proprietary matching process deploys the right-fit IAM advisors, engineers, and operators tailored to your culture and goals.We rigorously vet the top 1% through interviews, assessments, and background checks. Within days, we match and onboard the right-fit talent tailored to your needs, leading to costs saving while accelerating speed to value.
SharpITS provides agile service offering that can be tailored to suit each organization’s unique needs. Our staff augmentation offering includes:
IAM resources in all levels for IAM Implementation or operational support in any major IAM technology
All IAM related roles including IAM Program Manager, Project Manager, Architect, Business Analyst, Engineer, Developer, QA Tester, support etc
Cloud security implementation and support
Project-based or ongoing operational augmentation
High quality with discounted rate
Fastest turnaround
Flexible engagement models: Full-time, part-time, onshore, offshore, hybrid
Backfill guarantee for talent replacement if needed Complimentary advisory hours with IAM subject matter experts
As an industry leader, we meticulously vet and onboard only the highest quality experts. This gives you exclusive access to certified professionals with proven skills across all major IAM platforms
Our dedicated talent advisors carefully evaluate technical capabilities, soft skills, culture fit and more to create custom-fit teams that complement your environment.
Our cloud-based talent bench and flexible engagement models allow rapid provisioning. Scale up or down on- demand to match shifting priorities and budgets.
We manage the entire talent lifecycle end-to-end with oversight of performance, risk, and compliance. This ensures effectiveness and continuity.
Continuous improvement drives mutual success. Regular check-ins uncover opportunities to refine skills fit, improve results, and swap resources as needed.
Industry-leading SLAs including 24x7 support, guaranteed backfills, and dedicated account management provide complete peace of mind on augmented talent.
Onboard certified experts to execute high- impact IAM initiatives without delays hiring and training full-time staff. Hit the ground running.
Resources Scale talent up or down to match workloads, while only paying for resources used. No excess FTE overhead.
Vetted talent adheres to policies and protocols, reducing insider risks. Oversight maintains standards.
Augment bandwidth with specialized skills and experience needed from SharpITS experts to ensure flawless execution and adoption.
Offload critical but non-core IAM tasks to trusted SharpITS resources. This enables your team to focus on driving growth and strategy.
Rapidly adjust the skills mix as organizational needs change. Access cutting-edge capabilities on-demand to support growth.
Companies often opt for staff augmentation to enhance operations cost-effectively, acquire new skills swiftly, and efficiently  expand their capabilities.
When you need specialized skills or knowledge that you do not have in-house
Boost your capacity during peak periods with ease!
Stay agile and seize market changes and opportunities with lightning-fast responses.
Mitigate risk, diversify expertise, empower the team.

/services/iam-advisory-and-assessment-se.title: IAM Advisory and Assessment Services | IAM Solution Providers

headings.text: Begin your digital transformation journey with IAM Advisory and Assessment services
Thoroughly assess your current state, identify/prioritize and remediate gaps and issues, define effective IAM strategy and roadmap, SharpITS can help you every step of the way.
Why SharpITS for Your IAM Advisory & Assessment
How Can SharpITS Help Your IAM Advisory services

paragraphs.text: SharpITS IAM Advisory and Assessment provides an   expert evaluation of your current IAM state to provide actionable recommendations tailored to your environment and strategic priorities.

Our team of certified IAM professionals can help you  identify gaps and vulnerabilities in your current IAM program, benchmark against industry best practices, and develop a roadmap to achieve your IAM goals. We take a holistic approach in evaluating your people, processes, and technologies around IAM and access control.SharpITS was engaged to assess, remediate and stabilize others’ IAM implementations from time to time by large organizations. We are honored to have earned that position and trust.
With many successful IAM assessment and strategy services, our proven methodology and focus on pragmatic solutions position us as the ideal partner for your IAM advisory and assessment needs.
Thorough analysis of your current IAM strategies, policies, processes and technologies to understand the maturity of your IAM program.
Assessment of IAM capabilities against industry standards and best practices to identify and prioritize high risk and gaps that need to be addressed.
Interviews with key stakeholders to understand your unique IAM objectives, pain points and challenges and  provide tailored recommendations.
In-depth evaluation of your IAM architecture, tool integration, roles, access controls and workflows to identify issues.
Vendor-neutral approach on selecting, implementing and integrating right IAM solutions based on your budget and requirements.
Prioritized roadmap of tactical and strategic initiatives to strengthen IAM program governance, optimize processes, and align to business goals.
Identity's Power: IAM Assessment, Your Gateway to Secure Success!
Identify security gaps and compliance risks
Prioritize IAM initiatives based on business impact
Align IAM program to changing business needs
Evaluate effectiveness of current IAM strategies and technologies
Optimize IAM processes for efficiency and user experience
Comprehensive IAM strategy
Roadmap development
Design recommendations & product selection
Example Success Story And Feedback  From A Canadian Government

SharpITS to assess our IAM program because of instability and sustainability concerns. Their rigorous evaluation uncovered critical security gaps, compliance risks, and high priority issues in our IAM architecture and processes. As a highly qualified IAM advisory firm, SharpITS exceeded expectations through in-depth analysis.

keen insights into our IAM tool integration, access certifications, role engineering, infrastructure hosting, system configurations, performance tuning, reporting and auditing. Their assessment established a clear baseline understanding of IAM capabilities against industry standards.

headings.text: Automate provisioning processes, simplify security controls, build modernized IGA in cloud, achieve Zero Trust across Multi-cloud ecosystems.
How Can SharpITS Help Your IGA  Implementation

paragraphs.text: SharpITS can help you address all these challenges and transform your IGA posture to a future state that  is in line with industry leading practices while meeting your business objectives.
1. Establish centralized Identity Governance (IGA) platform and integrate with authoritative source
2. Automated lifecycle management for all user types (Joiner and Leaver)
3. Automation and streamlining of birthright access provisioning
4. Kick start application onboarding for crown-jewel applications into IGA platform
5. Enforce appropriate access rights by configuring automated access reviews and Segregation of duty (SOD) policies as part of application onboarding
6. Integrate IGA Platform with Privileged Access Management platform for overall governance and management of safes
7. Streamline application onboarding and transform into factory model for expedited and extended coverage including Role Based Access Control (RBAC)
8. Automate mover and rehire lifecycle events for identities
9. Integrate IGA Platform with SIEM for real-time monitoring of anomalies, alerting and automated remediation
SharpITS Identity Governance and Administration Best Practices in 2023

In 2023, the digital landscape continues to evolve rapidly, transforming businesses and industries alike. As technology permeates every aspect of our lives, the importance of IGA cannot be overstated.

headings.text: Secure your enterprise and protect your workforce users with the industry's leading and easy to use access management solution.

paragraphs.text: SharpITS has established itself as a  leading provider of Enterprise Access Management (EAM) solutions, with many successful implementations for our valued enterprise customers. Our skilled team makes it easy and secure for your workforce to access the apps and data they need to be productive.

At SharpITS, we are focused on keeping your enterprise access simple yet secure.  Our solutions provide capabilities to easily keep track of user logins and enable self-service options to maximize efficiency.  We take care to ensure that users are granted access rights tailored precisely to their roles and responsibilities - no more and no less.

A key differentiator for SharpITS is our team of highly skilled and certified consultants across all major IAM vendor technologies. We offer the full spectrum of access management services to help you achieve your core EAM goals and ensure your enterprise is securely aligned to your strategic business objectives.
From assessment and advisory to implementation, modernization, and all the way to fully managed EAM services, SharpITS has the expertise to deliver the ideal solution for your unique needs.

Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) is a leading cloud-based identity and access management service offered by Microsoft. It provides organizations with the tools they need to manage user access, improve security, and create seamless experiences.

We are honored to have earned that position and trust.

paragraphs.text: For over a decade, SharpITS has been a recognized leader in digital identity and cybersecurity services. We are headquartered in Toronto, Canada and also have offices in the U.S. and India. We service clients across North America, Europe, Middle East and Asia Pacific through our broad geographic presence and delivery capabilities..
To be the most trusted partner in enabling secure digital transformation for our global clients through continuous IAM innovation.
To deliver world-class IAM services to protect our client’s critical assets and solutions tailored to their needs, enabled by our deep IAM expertise and service excellence.

With a sharp focus on identity and access management, our experts become an extension of your team to strategize, execute, and manage comprehensive IAM programs. From consulting to technology integration to managed services, we provide the layered solutions and 24/7 support needed to defend your enterprise. We offer leading IAM solutions including IGA, EAM, PAM, and CIAM to govern access, manage risk, and drive efficiency.
Our highly skilled consultants have extensive experience with all major IAM vendor technologies including.

At SharpITS, we combine passion for security with practical business acumen to advance our client’s objectives. Our responsiveness and personalized approach allow us to architect IAM foundations that flex and scale as you grow. We enable organizations to adopt new technologies with confidence by securing access and protecting identities.Partnering with SharpITS means gaining a trusted IAM advisor committed to your changing requirements. We measure our success through our client’s satisfaction and aim to provide the highest level of service at every step.Contact SharpITS today to learn more about partnering with identity and access management leaders focused on delivering real value tailored to your organization.
Our experience has made us efficient and focused, precise and disciplined, and time and time again we help our customers manage and execute detailed real world, mission-critical implementations.

SharpITS’ advisory services have helped our clients in the development of business-focused IAM, PAM and cloud security strategies and roadmaps. We offer industry-leading experience in the implementation of digital identity solutions, while providing services to manage and support your existing IAM platform.
We also have over 30 years of extensive experience with Oracle databases. SharpITS assesses, prescribes the optimum solution, and locks down your database security.
Leveraging our best practices, SharpITS anticipates, identifies, and addresses the clients’ specific and most challenging IAM problems with tested, efficient and effective solutions.
How can our IAM, PAM and Cloud solutions facilitate optimization, modernization and transformation in your organization?

/company/our-partners.title: Trusted Digital Identity | IAM Implementation Partners

headings.text: Learn more about our model for technology and strategic partnerships and explore our partners.
Extensive Expertise Partner: Microsoft Entra ID
Preferred and Trusted Partner: One Identity
Some of our featured  strategic partners

paragraphs.text: With extensive expertise in Saviynt’s Identity Cloud, SharpITS delivers modern cloud governance, application access control, and third-party risk management. Leveraging Saviynt’s AI-driven analytics, we automate access certifications for SaaS platforms like Salesforce and Workday, ensuring least privilege enforcement. Clients achieve continuous compliance with GDPR and SOX while securing hybrid cloud migrations.

With deep knowledge of Microsoft’s cloud-based Entra ID platform, SharpITS helps companies maximize the value of Entra ID for workforce and external identity and access management. Our successful track record delivering Entra ID projects provides clients with optimized single sign-on, multifactor authentication, identity protection, and ability to integrate hybrid environments. SharpITS is a go-to Entra ID partner.

As an early Okta go-to partner in Canada since 2016, SharpITS has been instrumental in delivering Okta's leading Identity Cloud, including innovations like FastPass passwordless authentication and expanded IGA capabilities, to major enterprises across Canada. Leveraging our extensive integration expertise, we have implemented Okta's workforce and CIAM solutions to provide cutting-edge identity tailored to each client's needs.

With extensive Ping Identity expertise, SharpITS enables solutions like CIAM with PingOne, secure identity federation using PingFederate, and workforce SSO with PingAccess tailored for diverse industries and seamless digital experiences. Our expertise in their broad IAM portfolio provides integrated identity capabilities.

With extensive experience across Oracle's IAM portfolio, including OUD, OIG, OAM, OHS, Weblogic, Oracle DB and Oracle Cloud IAM, SharpITS has been a go-to Oracle partner for many years on complex IAM projects. We have successfully delivered many large scale Oracle Identity and Access Management implementations leveraging our veteran team of OIAM experts for end to end of IAM solutions. Our skills also extend to workforce, customers and citizens use cases with OAM integrations.

As a trusted BeyondTrust partner, SharpITS implements privileged access management (PAM) solutions like BeyondInsight and Password Safe to secure elevated accounts across IT, DevOps, and cloud environments. Our certified team reduces attack surfaces with just-in-time access and session monitoring, helping clients thwart ransomware and insider threats.

As a trusted and preferred One Identity partner since 2020, SharpITS delivers successful Active Roles, IGA and SafeGuard PAM solutions aligned to their long-term identity-centric approach. Working together, we enable comprehensive IAM and PAM programs integrated through our expertise. With both companies committed to long-term IAM success, our partnership provides robust solutions that evolve alongside emerging threats.

As a preferred Pathlock partner, SharpITS automates application access governance for SAP, Oracle EBS, and custom platforms. Using Pathlock’s controls, we enforce segregation of duties (SoD) and streamline audit workflows, reducing financial fraud risks and ensuring SOX compliance.

SharpITS partners with FrontEgg to enhance the security of customer-facing applications by providing embedded authentication and no-code identity workflows. Our seamless CIAM (Customer Identity and Access Management) integrations cater to both B2B and B2C use cases, ensuring frictionless user experiences without compromising security. By leveraging FrontEgg’s developer-first SDKs, we enable rapid deployment of authentication and authorization solutions, while our deep expertise in threat detection, access control, and regulatory compliance helps businesses safeguard sensitive data and maintain industry standards.

As a trusted Zilla Security partner, SharpITS specializes in delivering comprehensive Identity Governance and Access Management (IAM) solutions that simplify compliance and mitigate access risks. Utilizing Zilla’s advanced platform for automated access reviews and real-time risk assessments, we enable organizations to strengthen their security posture across hybrid environments. Our experts integrate Zilla’s innovative tools to ensure continuous monitoring, enforce least-privilege access, and streamline compliance with regulatory frameworks such as SOX, GDPR, and CCPA.

As a highly experienced CyberArk partner, SharpITS helps organizations securely manage and monitor privileged access to protect against threats, with a large team of CyberArk CDE and Guardian certified experts. Leveraging our expertise implementing CyberArk’s complete PAM platform, including Password Vault and Privileged Access Manager, we strengthen privileged access security across hybrid environments

With deep expertise in SailPoint’s IdentityIQ and IdentityNow platform, SharpITS has been a trusted partner since SailPoint’s early days, successfully delivering advanced identity governance programs both on-premises and in the cloud. Our clients benefit from SailPoint’s comprehensive identity lifecycle management combined with our skills integrating end-to-end identity processes, preventive/detective controls, and optimized end-user experiences.

With specialized expertise in CIAM, SharpITS helped deliver innovative Auth0 identity solutions focused on superior developer experience and B2B/B2C use cases prior to their Okta acquisition. We now integrate Auth0’s continued private cloud deployment, ITDR capabilities, and blockchain integrations combined with our expertise into broader identity programs.

With deep expertise in ForgeRock's Identity Cloud and on-prem AM/IDM/DS/IG Platform, SharpITS delivers innovative identity and access management, seamless workforce SSO capabilities and frictionless customer journeys. Our success integrating the complex and full scope of enterprise access management, identity governance solutions and customer authentication and authorization journeys on ForgeRock Identity Cloud makes us a leading ForgeRock partner for enabling modern digital ecosystems.

With deep expertise in IBM Security Verify, SharpITS enables adaptive authentication and seamless single sign-on (SSO) for global enterprises. Leveraging IBM’s AI-driven risk analytics, we secure workforce and customer identities across cloud and on-premises systems. Our implementations reduce credential-stuffing risks and streamline compliance for industries like healthcare and finance.

As a trusted partner, SharpITS helps maximize cybersecurity protections using Delinea’s Privilege Manager, Secret Server, and DevOps Secrets Vault solutions. Drawing on our integration skills, we implement privileged access controls and security both on-prem and SaaS to prevent breaches across hybrid IT.

As Beyond Identity's first Canadian partner, SharpITS is helping shape passwordless authentication's future through expertise implementing their innovative platform that enables just-in-time, dynamic access control. We combine Beyond Identity’s strengths with our integration skills for robust, dynamic access control.

A trusted RSA partner, SharpITS deploys RSA SecurID for phishing-resistant multi-factor authentication (MFA) and identity governance. Our solutions enforce risk-based access policies for privileged users, simplifying compliance with NIST 800-63B while securing remote access to legacy and cloud systems.

As a strategic Axiomatics partner, SharpITS enables organizations to implement dynamic authorization and attribute-based access control (ABAC) for granular, real-time access decisions. Leveraging Axiomatics’ Policy Server and Policy Editor, we design context-aware policies that align with Zero Trust frameworks, securing access to sensitive data in hybrid cloud, APIs, and custom applications. Our expertise integrates Axiomatics with leading IGA platforms (e.g., Saviynt, SailPoint) to enforce least privilege, automate compliance, and simplify audits for GDPR, HIPAA, and NIST standards.

As a strategic Gardiyan partner, SharpITS delivers advanced IGA solutions to automate access governance, enforce least privilege, and eliminate compliance gaps. Leveraging Gardiyan’s AI-driven role engineering and access certification workflows, we streamline identity lifecycle management across SAP, AWS, and hybrid IT environments. Our certified experts integrate Gardiyan’s SoD policies and audit-ready reporting to reduce insider threats and ensure compliance with SOX, GDPR, and CCPA.

/company/why-sharpits.title: Why SharpITS | A Leading Digital Identity Service Provider

headings.text: Discover why SharpITS is recoginized as a digital identity leader.
Unlock your organization's potential with SharpITS - the  identity experts trusted by global enterprises.
Delivering IAM Solutions With Never-Fail Determination
Our highly skilled consultants have extensive experiences with all major IAM vendor technologies including
We Focus On You – The Enterprise Customer
We Stand Behind You With Deep Knowledge And Extensive Experience
We Are Guided By Best Practices
We Have The Agility And Flexibility Only Found In Small Firms

paragraphs.text: For over a decade, SharpITS has been a trusted partner to leading organizations seeking to transform identity and access management. With our relentless focus on innovation, SharpITS empowers companies to securely unlock the full potential of their workforce, data, and technology. Our end-to-end capabilities span consulting, design, implementation, managed services, and thought leadership. Whether your goal is reducing risk, enabling growth through digital initiatives, or achieving operational excellence, SharpITS has the experience to deliver success.

We stay ahead of the curve by continuously evaluating and adopting cutting-edge approaches and technologies. We recognize every organization has unique needs and measures success differently. We stand behind our work and our customers. Our track record demonstrates our ability to deliver the tangible, positive impacts that matter most.

At SharpITS, your needs come first. We take the time to truly understand your organization, environment, and IAM goals so we can deliver customized solutions to support your success. Our experts become an extension of your team, providing strategic guidance tailored to your unique requirements.

Our practice leaders are the best in the business and will strive to become your trusted advisor. We have more than 25 years’ expert experience in the enterprise, keeping critical systems up and running, performing upgrades and migrations, installing updates and patches – all while minimizing downtime and maximizing productivity.

SharpITS focuses on innovation that creates measurable results for your organization. We combine creative thinking with a rigorous approach to develop enduring solutions that address your real-world needs and deliver impactful outcomes.

Our rigorous methodology ensures we build and manage your IAM environment according to security, operational and compliance best practices. This reduces risk, increases stability, and helps achieve your IAM goals efficiently. You can trust SharpITS solutions are designed right the first time.

SharpITS is committed to your long-term IAM success. We take a proactive partnership approach, equipping you with the knowledge and tools to get the most value from your IAM program and resolve issues before they impact you. With SharpITS, you have a trusted advisor by your side for the life of your IAM solution.

We have the knowledge and professionalism of a large consulting firm, with the customer focus and innovative nature of a small company. Our practice leaders are empowered to do what is needed to get the job done for our customers. You will not find yourself burdened by endless change orders, left alone to finish up an implementation, or wondering what’s next. Instead, you’ll find us there with you, side-by-side, working through the details and driving results.

SharpITS has the skills and experience to deliver on your IAM goals, no matter where you are starting from. Our consultants will collaborate closely with you and leverage deep expertise to help you successfully build, implement and manage an IAM program that realizes value.
